definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: 母亲节那天，在胸前佩戴石竹花。

sentences.english: Here are some suggestions of things to get your mom for Mother's day.
sentences.chinese: 下面有些小提示可以帮你在母亲节尽表孝心。

sentences.english: Traditionally Mothers Day is the big "Flowers and Chocolate" day.
sentences.chinese: 传统的母亲节是一个大的“花与巧克力节”。

sentences.english: On this day we honor you: dear mother.
sentences.chinese: 我们将戮力使即日成为您过得最愉快的母亲节。

sentences.english: We offer you our sincerest wishes for a very enjoyable Mother's Day.
sentences.chinese: 我们诚挚地祝福您母亲节愉快。

sentences.english: I encourage my children to attend Mothers' Day Carnival.
sentences.chinese: 我会鼓励孩子参加母亲节园游会。

sentences.english: Mother's Day is probably one of the most lucrative times of the year for florists.
sentences.chinese: 母亲节很可能是花商一年中最为盈利的日子。

sentences.english: You can organise tea parties in honor of your mother on a Mothers Day。
sentences.chinese: 母亲节那天你可以“以母之名”举办一场茶话会。

sentences.english: Today is Mother''s Day and all the jewellery is on sale at Rich''s.
sentences.chinese: 今天是母亲节，瑞奇店的所有首饰全部折价出售。

sentences.english: Mother's Day is a long-held tradition of revering the woman who gives the gift of life.
sentences.chinese: 母亲节是一个长期奉行的敬女谁给生命的恩赐。

sentences.english: Have a very happy Mother’s Day.
sentences.chinese: 祝您有一个很快乐的母亲节。

sentences.english: Anna Jarvis is recognised as the Founder of Mothers Day in US.
sentences.chinese: 安娜贾维斯是公认的美国母亲节的创始人。

sentences.english: The best Mother's Day gift I ever received was a magnolia 1 tree.
sentences.chinese: 在母亲节我收到的最好的礼物要算是一棵木兰树。

sentences.english: Have a very happy Mother's Day.
sentences.chinese: 祝您有一个很快乐的母亲节。

sentences.english: Where are people likely to shop for Mom?
sentences.chinese: 那么人们倾向于去哪些地方购买母亲节礼物呢？

sentences.english: The more recent history of Mothers Day dates back to 1600s in England.
sentences.chinese: 对母亲节更近的历史可以追溯到17世纪的英格兰。

definition: Teachers' Day (September 10th in PRC and Confucius's birthday, September 28th in Taiwan)
Children's Day (June 1st), PRC national holiday for children under 14

Qixi Festival or Double Seven Festival on the 7th day of the 7th lunar month/girls' festival/Chinese Valentine's day, when Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女[niu2 lang3 zhi1 nu:3] are allowed their annual meeting
double seven festival, evening of seventh of lunar seventh month/girls' festival/Chinese Valentine's day, when Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女 are allowed their annual meeting
the Mid-Autumn Festival on 15th of 8th lunar month
Double Ninth or Yang Festival/9th day of 9th lunar month
Arbor Day (March 12th), also known as National Tree Planting Day 全民義務植樹日|全民义务植树日[Quan2 min2 Yi4 wu4 Zhi2 shu4 ri4]
